aboutText:
I discovered my passion for development in my first year of college, after building a real-world website for ABS Tours and Travels using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Seeing it live on Hostinger sparked my interest, and since then, Iâ€™ve been driven to explore full-stack development, automation, and scalable system design. 
 Today, I serve as a software developer and strategically execute select freelance initiatives through my tech brand, NGVP.
